alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 11:51AM CDT until June 17 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1150 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Petersburg, or 12 miles northeast of Pulaski, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Mulberry, Howell, Belleville, Mcburg, Coldwater, Harms, Mimosa, Camargo and Boonshill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
